availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza J. Robards. Father of Louisa F. Robards, Lewis Robards, Robert Robards, and Jefferson Robards. Farmer in Garrard County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 219A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 738
Find A Grave, "Jefferson Robards (c1804-September 4, 1882)," Memorial #44036929, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/44036929 (accessed October 10, 2019).
